Collection: issues

The issues collection is positioned as an issue-management pack: profiles/agents/context aimed at working with issues (tracking, triage, workflows).

What youâ€™d typically expect

  • Profiles and agent prompts for issue triage and structured follow-ups
  • Conventions for turning conversations into actionable tickets/tasks

How to evaluate it

  • Check what profiles it adds and what modules those profiles mount.
  • Review any tools/modules referenced by the collection before using it in sensitive environments.
